review: Long story short we only have DVRs in two rooms (living room and our bedroom) and NOTHING for our guests.  We don't have guests enough to pay for an extra DVR box through DirecTV so I got this.  I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this product.  On days I feel like hibernating, I go into the guest room and watch all of my favorite shoes on my Fire Stick on the tv in there.  Hulu, Amazon, Netflix (I have them all), so it is worth it to me to have a product that let's me (but my guests) always have something great to watch.
